General.Name: Alien Metals Ltd
General.Description: Alien Metals Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the acquisition and development of mineral resource assets. The company explores for copper, zinc, lead, silver, gold, iron ore, and precious metal deposits. Its flagship project is the 90% owned Hancock Iron Ore Project located in Western Australia. The company was formerly known as Arian Silver Corporation and changed its name to Alien Metals Limited in October 2018. Alien Metals Ltd was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Green Park Hous, London, United Kingdom, W1J 8LQ
